creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: whitish bowl with blue underglaze motifs; abstracted, scrolling, ribbon-like designs alternating with stylized characters within double circles; stylized character inside outlined with two blue circles
medium: Porcelain or porcelaineous stoneware with cobalt-blue designs under clear glaze
title: Bowl with auspicious treasures and Chinese longevity character
